title: RollCall #2
body:
This is a call to discuss a frameworks to help aid with coordination between the various EVM-like L2s. The idea is to establish **optional** norms and standards for L2s to be able to extend the EVM and related tooling while limiting conflicts with the L1 EVM and preventing a proliferation of mutually incompatible standards among the L2s.

## Meeting Info

- [Wed Jan 10, 2024, 14:00-15:30 UTC](https://savvytime.com/converter/utc-to-germany-berlin-united-kingdom-london-ny-new-york-city-ca-san-francisco-china-shanghai-japan-tokyo-australia-sydney/jan-10-2024/2pm)
- Zoom link shared on `RIP coordination` in the RollCall channel in the [EthR&D Discord](https://discord.com/invite/qGpsxSA) which is bridged to the RollCall telegram channel shortly before the call.
- Previous call: #907
- Recording will be available on YouTube after the fact


## Agenda

- [EIP-7587](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8074) - RIP pre-compile address space reservation
- R1 Precompile
- RIP Working Groups (@adietrichs)

## Further discussion

Feel free to add comments to this issue with further items of discussion
